name: Tsuki no Hikari no Kusariya-san
storyline:
A full moon night...
Lost and at a loss, Serena (protagonist, name can be changed) was in tears and was telling her fortune with a tarot card she picked up on a whim, when suddenly, a mysterious light overflowed. When she opened her eyes, a strange boy was standing there.

"I'll take on all of your pain, suffering, and sorrow."

The boy's name was Lumiere.
He called himself a wizard and proposed a contract. Believing it to be a dream, the next moment they made the contract...

The image of herself reflected in the mirror had been transformed into a beautiful bisque doll. Now a doll, Serena was led by Lumiere into the mansion where he lived...
summary:
"I'll take on all your pain and suffering."

A slightly dark fantasy romance novel about spending time with a young wizard.
